purpose: TU Braunschweig is recruiting for a tenured Associate Professorship in Verification. The email encourages recipients to reach out with questions and to share the job offer with interested colleagues.
evidence_sentences: TU Braunschweig is recruiting an Associate Professor in Verification (tenured, W2)
If you have questions, do not hesitate to ask me.
If you have colleagues who may be interested, please distribute the offer.
